lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I live in a country that has given me so many opportunities to succeed in life. I know that there are very hard working people out there who just want the same chance to succeed that I have been given. I am here to help them get that chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Executive Chef at a hotel, I am in charge of a kitchen of Chefs and cooks.

lender.name: Alice

lender.name: Michal & Amara
lender.loan_because: even the smallest actions can have a huge impact in people's lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I don't like donating to a charity where I don't see the result of my donation. I can only afford to give a little right now, and with kiva, I can see my money at work. Also, it's a gift that keeps giving: when one recipient pays the loan back, the money can go to another and another, and help many people make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior undergraduate at the University of Alabama, studying biology. I hope to pursue a Master's Degree, and then a PhD. My primary areas of research interest are animal behavior, endocrinology, and evolutionary biology (specifically, how the evolution and endocrinology shape behavior).

lender.name: Joe E.
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without the generosity of others. This is my way of giving back where I can.

lender.name: Khurram

lender.occupational_info: Studying for my PhD in International Development

lender.occupational_info: I am a student pursuing a career in medicine.

lender.occupational_info: I teach my children at home—to love Jesus, and to love learning.

lender.name: Flexi IT (Web Design)
lender.occupation: Website design company based at gold coast, Aus.
lender.loan_because: We are website design company based at Gold Coast, Australia. We offer professional web designing and specialize in software development and business automation
lender.occupational_info:
Flexi IT Solutions is a Gold Coast based business specialising in business automation. We develop custom software, web applications, websites and graphic design specific to your businesses needs. Our custom offline and online applications will ensure that your company runs as efficiently and as cost effectively as possible.
Here at Flexi IT Solutions on the Gold Coast. Our custom software development and database design solutions are tailored to your needs.
Unlimited changes until your 100% happy.
* Logo Design * Graphic Design * Business Card Design * Letter Head Design * Banners and Advertising Material Design
The internet can do more for you than just advertise your business. It can help run and automate your business!
A common example of a web application is Internet Banking and Online Shopping (eCommerce).
Call 0405 015 147 to speak to Dan today!
Flexi IT Solutions 102 West Burleigh Rd Burleigh Heads QLD, 4220 Australia
Phone : 0405 015 147 Fax : 0756770662
Email : flexi.it.solutions@gmail.com Web : http://www.flexi-it.com.au

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make a difference in people's lives by believing their dreams and helping in any way to make that possible.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products to individuals to enhance their love lives and educate the masses on obtaining and/or maintaining a healthy outlook on sexuality.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that many little individuals giving very little amounts that on their own would make precious little difference collectively can make huge, amazing, earth shattering changes to peoples lives in positive and empowering ways. What a hoot!
lender.occupational_info: In my work I use natural ways to help sick people get better. I like the idea that everyone is of service to each other in some way. Helping gives me a sense of community and value.

lender.name: Jannike
lender.loan_because: I am interested in different aspects of ethical finance, and I find that Kiva is a wonderful way of empowering people. I want to be part of this!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small alternative bank "social banking", which give loans to projects that have a positive social and environmental impact.

lender.name: Maria Jose
lender.loan_because: Desde nuestro lugar, cada uno puede hacer un poquito por cambiar la vida de los demás. No podemos hacer grandes cosas, pero un poquito cada uno, seguro que conseguimos que algo cambie. ¡Hay que intentarlo!
lender.occupational_info: Trabajo en un pequeño pueblo, como profesora de educación de adultos.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand to escape from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I translate or manage the translation and editing of books and reports on scientific and cultural topics.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: If people take time to help each other, it makes the world just that much better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, servers, networking.

lender.name: Anton Widjaja
lender.loan_because: To buy a set of computer, with specification i PC Dual Core , LCD Monitor 17 " and HP Printer
lender.occupational_info: Receive order for content write, review, and customise writer

lender.name: spentrails
lender.loan_because: In the right hands, a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company in London that works with pensions.

lender.name: francois
lender.occupation: Entrepreneur/ Support some chidren for school fees

lender.name: HECTOR
lender.loan_because: such investment help families achieve a better life style.
lender.occupational_info: Help people achieve their goals (dreams)

lender.name: Microveertig
lender.loan_because: we wanted to do something different for our 40th birthday. Instead of presents we asked for a donation to be invested by us in microcredits.

lender.name: Breanna Toyne
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage women to become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital as a registered nurse.

lender.name: Katie & Nick
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. We are all connected and if we help each other, we can make this world a little better place for everyone.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance.

lender.name: hellonline
lender.loan_because: free casinos, online games, casino
lender.occupational_info: This is a good listing of free casinos, best place to start gambling and win more!

lender.name: hilda
lender.loan_because: to make a positive difference. proverbs 3 v 27 do not withold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partaker of GOD'S favour and grace,i have the inheritance, therefore i reach out to those in need and share my blessings.

lender.name: Evelina
lender.loan_because: I want to make some one happy and fullfill their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a janitor in the city church in my town called Falun, in the middle of Sweden. I help the priests and all the cleaning at church, and i help with guideing, all the cermonys - as wedding, funerals and regular sunday services. Other than that Im a hairdresser.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have spare money and it doesn't hurt anybody. (rhymes, check it.)
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for the Internet experience and connectivity of thousands of people.

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: I have been gifted with incredible opportunities for self-sufficiency and not dependency.

lender.name: The Bugbees
lender.loan_because: We can only begin to repay the kindness that has been shown to us.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I love to help women to be sucessful in their business dream. I know what is to be poor and not able to go forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and enterpreneur working to serve and help others.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. Keep lending
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Office on the computer all day.

lender.name: alberta
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Damiano
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people reach their financial independence

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Jesus gave His all.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing the good news of Jesus.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: Acts 1:8

lender.name: Perry Ross
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my and my family and I know that I would not be where I am today if people had not believed in me and supported me throughout the years.
lender.occupational_info: I lead songs at my church and help encourage people to worship God through music or anyway they feel they can express their gratitude for Him.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the encouragement that believing in someone provides.
lender.occupational_info: We bring the hope of Christ to listeners through great Christian music.

lender.name: Josh and Sarah
lender.loan_because: Both of us have spent time overseas, and believe in the importance of local entrepreneurs in improving an area's quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah teaches kids about music (how to make it, and how to appreciate it). Josh programs computers to do his bidding.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I'm angry about injustice and poverty in the world, and Kiva gives me a way to do something about it.
lender.occupational_info: I look after a one-year-old girl named Charlotte. We play, go for walks, have lunch, and take naps. It's fun!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: um... its awesome?
lender.occupational_info: to lead followers of Christ into time in his presence.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all God's children.

lender.name: Moses
lender.loan_because: the money generally comes back and can be re-loaned out; it's like a banking system where you can see the money being loaned, repaid, and loaned again!
lender.occupational_info: I run the finance, web, general building maintenance, health care, and vendor management for a local church.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: The gospel of Jesus Christ has transformed my life.
lender.occupational_info: I train others to lovingly share the horrible truth of abortion to thousands so they can, by God's grace, help save lives and help fathers and mothers one person at a time.

lender.name: Jen & Will
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of helping people help themselves and increasing our ability to assist others by adding new capital incrementally and using our repaid micro-loans to make an impact globally.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance industry - which makes Kiva all the more intuitive to me.

lender.name: Lynn and Allen
lender.loan_because: All we have is a gift of God to be shared with others.
lender.occupational_info: Lynn is an ordained pastor who is working in hospital chaplaincy. Allen is an ordained pastor who helps direct church planting for his church denomination in Canada and the USA.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think this is an efficient way to help people who are in need of a small amount of help to get a business going. I want to help because Christ and other people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of database programmers for a large provider of Internet services. I also work on their enterprise architecture team.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want others to know the love of Christ through me.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and husband who is a pastor and my five children. One of my sons is married and has three children. The son and his wife live near us. I help with church activites and love to share with our church families. I love to share Christ with others.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I support the director of a university institute that advances research in statistics and government.

lender.name: D.J. King
lender.loan_because: It creates sustainable solutions, rather than dependencies, by cultivating economic activity that entrepreneurs can take pride in.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: God has provided for all of my needs and the ability to give back to others - all for the glory of God.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build homes.

lender.name: Jon O.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become economically prosperous and self-sufficient. I want to use my resources to help others and give them hope and share God's love.
lender.occupational_info: I sell electronic components for use in cellular telephones, medical equipment and other wireless devices.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: my God has given me new life and eternal riches through his son, Jesus, and therefore He wants to live out His generosity and grace in and through my life.
lender.occupational_info: I actively manage investments for clients using stocks, bonds, funds, CD's etc. in order to grow client resources so that they may meet their own needs and be able to be more generous in their personal stewardship.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a decent living.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur with contract manufacturing operations in central Mexico. I am lending because it is part of our calling to build a triple bottom line business which includes; 1) make a profit, 2) give back to the communities that we operate, 3) help people grow in their walk with God.
lender.occupational_info: We have a contract manufacturing facilities in central Mexico which produce auto, appliance and medical device parts.

lender.name: Anita
lender.occupation: Manager for Smooth Jazz Artist, Drew Davidsen
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all that God has entrusted to me. Our music business tithes to Ghanian Mothers Hope which builds preschools, elementary schools, and health posts in rural Ghana. I know how helpful extra cash can be to building a business. I have friends in Ghana and so will focus on needs there at first.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring Drew's smooth jazz guitar music to the world.

lender.name: Mike and Tim
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand how micro-lending changes lives in an amazing way and want to be able to share God's resources with others.
lender.occupational_info: Help create shopping centers

lender.name: Jonathan & Jayme Miller
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping other entreprenuers get a start and empowering people to pursue their dreams and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the financial services business and CEO of a network of entreprenuers.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers how to write, how to love literature, and how to communicate with the world around them.

lender.name: Scott and Gretchen
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have a happy and comfortable life earned through hard work. We feel good to be able to give a helping hand to others around the world who are motivated to work for a better life for themselves and believe a hand up is better than a hand out. Through KIVA we've found that giving just a little can make a big difference. Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Scott supervises specialized piping for construction of pharmaceutical and semiconductor companies. Gretchen works with mentally disabled young adults and has her own business, running a Duplicate Bridge Club and teaching the game to newcomers.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: It feels good to think of people using these loans to help their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I show businesses how to get their ideas across to their customers using the internet.

lender.name: susanne
lender.loan_because:
a long time ago, when i had less than nothing, someone believed in me and gave me a helping hand. all that they asked for in return was that one day, when i could, i would help someone else.
and now, years later, i understand the power of believing in someone, and why Jesus places so much importance on helping those who need someone to believe enough in them that they do something about it with their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i tell people that my job is to make things pretty. i am passionate about clear communication, both visually and verbally.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected". Paraphrased from Matthew 25:14-30 I want God to find me generous and faithful with what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I provide people with medication to allow for better health. I educate them on how to take the medicine correctly and what to expect from it's effects.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it is a blessing to do so.

lender.name: Dru
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves a loan to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer software company that helps churches, schools, and charities raise money by having auctions.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I can and it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I want top help people in situations less fortunate than mine and to help them make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I go to school 7 hours a day, 5 days a week at a high school with 3000 students. Then I do my homework, and play soccer or run. I go to the beach.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves and their own communities and because loving Jesus compels me to love this way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach French and Spanish and tutor/disciple kids afterschool 3-6 in all areas including spiritual.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been to the Developing World and want to help in a practical manner. Kiva is the new wave of solid "person to person" system of involvement!
lender.occupational_info: I am involved with a foundation for a Christian Health care agency in North Jersey and minister to various local congregations.

lender.name: Kwasi
lender.loan_because: I wantto fight poverty, if you can use my money to help fight it, I will be very happy!

lender.name: Darla
lender.loan_because: I am always looking for ways to touch people's lives and make a concrete difference in this world. This is a perfect venue for doing so.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Corporation in San Diego, California.

lender.name: Bart and Jeni
lender.loan_because: I would like to give to those who are in need
lender.occupational_info: I work with electricity. My wife teaches children in 1st grade who are 5 and 6 years old.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I have been given a tremendous loan myself... this life! I want to help others achieve their dreams and potential.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a school in New York.

lender.name: Mike & Debbie
lender.loan_because: We enjoy seeing people's lives change when they get empowered to use the skills and enthusiasm God has given them.
lender.occupational_info: Mike does marketing for a global document management company. Debbie is a proposal analyst for IBM.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Becasue God had blessed me and my family. I want to see people succeed in this world and I want to give back. I want to help a fellow brother or sister............
lender.occupational_info: Protection of life and property. Keep the peace.

lender.name: mary beth
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Making a difference in people's lives, both inside and out.

lender.name: Keara
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I think that everyone deserves the chance to provide for their own family without having to rely on their government to do it for them. This is an opportunity for people to help each other reach success and then pay it forward to the next one down the line. It's a win-win situation!
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost, I am a happily married mother of 4 amazing girls and a foster mom to an amazing son from Congo, Africa who is now living independently and making a great living for himself here in the U.S.. Although we live mostly off of my husband's income, I work as an independent agent for an international student exchange organization. I began working as an Area Representative about 4 years ago. My job is to locate and secure loving families and homes for exchange students who come to the U.S. to study and improve their opportunities for their futures. Once the students arrive, I supervise them and help them to work through the adjustments of adapting to a new culture and a new family. I take the students and families on many trips and hold many parties for them throughout the year in hopes that I can make it the best experience for everyone involved. I also direct the Foreign Exchange Ministry at my local church. It's a Ministry that was founded in order to give the exchange students and refugees in our surrounding community a chance to experience God's love first-hand just by sharing time together, experiencing community service projects together, attending church together, and reaching out to our schools and communities together. We enjoy many cultural and spiritual events and trips together through the ministry and in the end, out of over 70 students that I've had in my ministry, over half of them have found Christ and have continued a relationship with Him. Working with international students is my number one passion but my biggest dream in life is to partake in missionary work. I am hoping to save enough money to take my family on an international mission trip so that we can all begin to see how much one person can make a difference but also to help us all realize that, even in our hardest economic struggles, we are a rich society with lots to be thankful for. Working as a Representative only pays enough to offer a minimal supplemental income which I use to take my kids to movies, buy them some toys or treats that they like, visit our relatives in Chicago, and so forth. To be honest, the joy that I get from working with the kids and families is WAY more than what any paycheck could give me so I don't really mind that it doesn't pay much. I just pray that I can one day make this into something much more than what it is now. I would like to expand my ministry and help other un-diverse regions of the U.S. see the joy in understanding other cultures, races, and countries and how we're not really that much different from one another. I hope that the impact that we've made here in this tiny little town of Michigan will spread like wildfire!

lender.name: Carla
lender.occupational_info: SLPs diagnose and treat children and adults with communication and/or swallowing problems.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Jessica Jackley was such an inspiration to me at the Willow Creek Leadership Summit and I love to be a part of the solution!

lender.loan_because: want to help someone in a significant way
lender.occupational_info: Raising money to help those in need of food clothing and shelter in my community.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Law professor/United Church of Christ seminarian
lender.loan_because: I have spent time in several developing countries where farmers struggle to get the financing they need to improve their lives. Most of my time is spent helping raise funds for clean water projects.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach people how to become lawyers or advocates so that they can make the world a better place.
I am also studying to be a pastor in the United Church of Christ because it is devoted to bringing the kingdom of God closer to earth for all, but especially the poorests of the poor.

lender.name: Yadira and Brandon
lender.loan_because: we must empower people so that they may empower themselfs
lender.occupational_info: connecting college students to the community by volunteering

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: the money I have is from God, which I am just "holding" for Him, and He's asked me to steward it well for His Kingdom purposes. How better to share it than with my brothers and sisters across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that assists local families in tough situations with home repair and maintenance.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I loan because I firmly believe that the only way to make a positive long term effect on global need is to empower, train and support individuals as well as model commerce such as lending and investing, so that through different seasons of people's lives, as well as their children’s lives, they will be able to sustain and support micro economies which make up and kick start an overall economy in their part of the world. I also am of the belief that people just don’t want others around the world to continue to send aid which creates dependency. My belief is that most people want to support their own needs and that from a personal standpoint processes which support areas such as micro economics is an excellent way for individuals to build self esteem as well as obtain a sense of achievement, which if and when successful will allow them to connect with others with needs and actually give true meaning to “pass it on”.
lender.occupational_info: I work at South Ridge Community Church-A Community Church in NJ. I offer leadership in the areas of Finance, Facilities and Administration.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40
lender.occupational_info: I teach, serve, and minister to middle school students.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: We can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counsellor who works to help others with emotional and mental health problems.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with local governments to help them decide what kind of community they want and how to make it happen.

lender.name: The Kreyes
lender.loan_because: We are a family on a mission to be the hands and feet of Christ in a broken world.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe Jesus has commanded us to reach out to the poor, the widows, the orphans and this is one way to do that, that is empowering. I believe in people helping people. I believe in helping ohers to help themselves.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with what I need and more. I know that by being born in a more affluent nation I have had opportunities that I take for granted that most of the world never had. I have International friends from many countries and what always impresses me is their very diligent work ethic. I believe that God entrusted me with the blessings He has given me; not so that I can keep them for myself, but so that I can be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work twelve hour shifts at a large University hospital taking care of heart patients. I love having a job that lets me reach out and touch the lives of others. By investing our selves in the lives of others I believe that we ourselves are blessed. My patients have the ability to touch my heart and life and to teach me new things about myself and other people every day I work.

lender.occupational_info: I started several oil and gas companies in the USA. I have had to borrow funds or raise partners. I know it is difficult. Best of luck to you.

They are driven, have a high learning agility and genuinely desire to increase their effectiveness as a leader at work and in life. My clients are usually at an inflection point in their career or are experiencing a "passion shift". They are looking for a partner to help them overcome hurdles, differentiate their talent, and produce fulfilling results. My client portfolio includes executives, coaches, entrepreneurs, and international consultants.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Increaseingly, I am becoming more aware of hunger and poverty around the world. Living in America we are use to having abundant resources so we can provide and increase our standard of living. As I read the stories I am humbled. Real people, real stories-not simply statistics which we hear so much we become immune to. The stories highlight people who just want a chance to provide for their families and their communties, and that is where it starts, at home first and that will resonate through the community.
lender.occupational_info: I manage properties for landowners who no longer farm their farms. By managing we work directly with farmers to operate the farm in a partnership type arrangement so all benefit.

lender.name: Tim in St. Louis
lender.loan_because: Reciprocity works. Before 1913, the average Federal tax rate was 3%. Oddly enough, people gave of their time and money more graciously. It's time to take back a spirit of giving and belief in humanity - our ability to dream - and achieve.
lender.occupational_info: I protect people, their families and businesses with financial services and products. I am called to serve despite my own shortfalls.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.name: KPIT_RPON_Project Team
lender.loan_because: We give locally, We help feed the homeless in the town we work in. This is the seed of our global giving.
